arts.ttl: Sunderland beat West Ham to make triumphant Premier League return
arts.sum: Sunderland make a winning start to their first Premier League campaign since 2016-17, with a deserved 3-0 win over West Ham United at the Stadium of Light.

arts.ttl: Regis Le Bris praises Sunderland’s ‘togetherness’ after beating West Ham
arts.sum: Following an eight-year absence from the top flight, goals from Eliezer Mayenda, Dan Ballard and substitute Wilson Isidor wrapped up the win.

arts.ttl: Sunderland 3 – 0 West Ham United | Final whistle first impressions
arts.sum: “A game of two halves”. Never truer than this afternoon as West Ham rolled over in the second half to an embarrassing capitulation against newly promoted Sunderland who thoroughly deserved their afternoon in the sun and three points. I’d expect every other Sunderland home fixture to be more contested than ‘that’ second half mismatch. West […] Source

arts.ttl: Sunderland beat West Ham on return to Premier League
arts.sum: Eliezer Mayenda, Dan Ballard and substitute Wilson Isidor scored at the Stadium of Light.

arts.ttl: Sunderland v West Ham | Hope for Hammers fans if Potter bites the bullet
arts.sum: Finally there is football to talk about as the Premier League kicks off for West Ham this afternoon. Following weeks of the ebb and flow of moods over the transfer activity – and lack of it- which the club has undertaken, events on the pitch take centre stage. At least a temporary respite from the […] Source

arts.ttl: Sunderland vs West Ham United – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Sunderland mark their return to the Premier League after an eight-year absence with a home fixture against West Ham United at the Stadium of Light on Saturday. Regis Le Bris’s side, promoted via the Championship play-offs, have undergone a significant squad rebuild with an eye on consolidation, while West Ham, under Graham Potter, seek to […] The post Sunderland vs West Ham United – Match preview and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Sunderland vs West Ham United – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Sunderland return to the Premier League this Saturday. They will host West Ham United in a significant opening fixture, ending an eight-year absence from the top flight. Fresh from their play-off success, Régis Le Bris has overseen a £130m squad transformation designed for survival. Meanwhile, Graham Potter leads a Hammers side targeting a return to […] The post Sunderland vs West Ham United – Predicted lineup and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: West Ham XI vs Sunderland – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: West Ham United open their 2025/26 Premier League season away at promoted Sunderland on Saturday, aiming to set a positive tone at the Stadium of Light. After finishing 14th last term, Graham Potter’s team integrates new signings with a focus on improvement, facing a Sunderland side full of momentum. This game tests West Ham’s early […] The post West Ham XI vs Sunderland – Predicted lineup and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Score Predictions: How will Sunderland fare against The Hammers?
arts.sum: Martin Wanless predicts… Score prediction: Sunderland 1 West Ham 0 Sunderland’s first goalscorer: Eliezer Mayenda It’s come around quickly, hasn’t it! The last time we were predicting the outcome of a game at the Stadium of Light, we had no clue as to which division our next home game would take place in. This is […]

arts.ttl: Fan Focus: West Ham fan Dan is predicting a score-draw on Sunderland’s Premier League return!
arts.sum: Graham Potter taken over at West Ham at the start of 2025, but results so far have been uninspiring. How is he viewed in the eyes of your fan base? A mixed bag overall so far. I think some have seen the performances as uninspiring perhaps, but it’s important to look at the bigger picture. […]
